article_title: Karl Rove: My Fearless Political Predictions for 2015
article_text:
Since Christmas and New Year’s Day both fell on a Thursday, wiping out my weekly columns in the name of holiday cheer, this is my first opportunity to rate the success of my 2014 predictions and offer new ones for 2015.

I got 13 political prognostications right for 2014. On Election Day, President Obama’s disapproval was 54%, higher than his 53% at the start of the year. The GOP kept the House (but picked up 14 seats, not six as I...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Karl Rove says that GOP officials will forgo Iowa’s Ames Straw Poll, there will be a Supreme Court vacancy, and more.
twitter.title: My Fearless Political Predictions for 2015
